response.job_title: Head of Data Science & AI | Machine Learning Manager| Data Science Team Leader
response.summary: I am a lover, curious and passionate about the STEM world. Data Engineer and Machine Learning Engineer Certified by Google Cloud with experience leading Machine Learning, Big Data and Data Lake projects. I have led teams of more than 40 professionals, including data scientists, data engineers, machine learning engineers and data analysts. Strong technical and soft skills to understand business needs and transform them into data-driven solutions. Researcher with more than seven years of experience in Natural Language Processing
response.skills: Leadership, Management, Data Science, Amazon Web Services (AWS), MLOps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Business Strategy, Analytical Skills, Team Leadership, Project Management, SQL, Python (Programming Language), Strategic Planning, Machine Learning, Big Data, Análisis de datos, Minería de datos, Deep Learning, BI

profile_positions.description:
* Redefine the company's analytics and AI strategy
* Lead the reconstruction and enhancement of the data and analytics team
* Lead the refinement of existing analytics solutions, propose innovative AI products, and guide their development
* Many other goals that are on the way!
profile_positions.title: Head of Data & Analytics

profile_positions.description: Lead the MLOps strategy in the company
profile_positions.title: Data Specialist

profile_positions.description:
* Lead Data Science and projects in the cross Machine Learning Delivery area
* Lead and advise Machine Learning Project Managers
* Design with the ML experts solutions based on ML for the areas of fraud and marketing
* Transform problems and business requirements into ML-based solutions
* Lead and supervise solutions implemented in Bigquery
profile_positions.title: Manager of Machine Learning

profile_positions.description:
* Build and lead the Data & Artificial Intelligence team 
* Provide technical guidance, people management and improvements in how the team works.
* Work with the ML Experts and the CTO to create the company's Data and ML strategy.
* Create an upskilling and professional growth plan for the Data team.
* Work with sales and marketing teams to understand client requirements and identify opportunities to drive business solutions based on Data
* Lead and coordinate internal and external training processes in Google Cloud Computing and Data Science
* Lead Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence projects
* Lead the design and development of multiple Data Lakes
profile_positions.title: Head of Data Science

profile_positions.description:
* Design and implement architectures oriented to Big Data.
* Configure and maintain Cloud Servers.
* Set up and maintain a cluster with Cassandra for distributed storage.
* Develop applications to consume data from social media.
* Develop projects using Natural Language Processing techniques
profile_positions.title: Investigador Junior

profile_positions.description:
* Design Big Data and Business Intelligence solutions for different companies.
* Analyse and predict trends oriented to retail markets using Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques.
* Analyse and predict trends in the foreign exchange markets using Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist
